description: An advanced freeware audio player for the Windows platform.
notes: WARNING: foobar2000 package is reverting back to non-portable installation.
If you still want portable version, use foobar2000-portable instead.
If you want to migrate persisted data to portable version
post_installer: if (Test-Path "$(appdir foobar2000-encoders $global)\current") { New-Item "$dir\encoders" -ItemType Junction -Target "$(appdir foobar2000-encoders $global)\current" | Out-Null }
